description: Set/Delete variables across many Travis CI repos

travis_token.description: Travis API token for the target projects

org.description:
Name of the Travis CI (i.e., GitHub) organization to update.

NOTE: **All** repos under the org will be affected unless 'repo_filter' is also specified

action.description: Whether to set or delete the variable

variable.description: The variable to set or delete

value.description: The value to set (required when 'action' is 'set')

repo_filter.description: Substring to filter repos to affect.
